tourName: Maharastra and Gujarat holiday in India
generalInfo:
Maharashtra and Gujarat are amongst the largest and most prosperous states in India. These states have got unique monuments, food, arts and culture that are worth experiencing. Go on a tour of these states and experience the highlights that these states have to offer.

Some of the prominent experiences are highlighted below:

1. Visit the Elephanta Caves in Mumbai that are UNESCO World Heritage listed
2. Experience highlights of Mumbai like CST, Dhobi Ghat, Gandhi Museum etc.
3. Visit the ancient Ajanta and Ellora Caves at Aurangabad that are UNESCO listed
4. Visit the different Vineyards of Nashik and taste the authentic Indian Wines
5. Visit the Maratha Style palaces along with other monuments at Pune.
6. Explore Ahmedabad on a sightseeing tour, also a textile hub of India – see its highlights including Akshardham Temple, Textile Museum, Adalaj Stepwell, colourful markets etc.
7. Experience the magni?cent Sun Temple in Modhera
8. Visit the Little Rann of Kutch at Dasada - known for its birdlife and Wild Asses
9. Experience Bhuj, the largest city in Kucth on a sightseeing tour and see its highlights like Prag Mahal, Aina Mahal, Bhujio Hill, Hamirsar Lake, Banni village etc.

dayInfo.description: Arrive at Mumbai International Airport. Receive a warm welcome from our representative and get transferred to the hotel. On arrival complete the check-in procedure and enjoy the rest of the day at leisure.

After breakfast, visit the • Elephanta Caves – Oldest Caves near Mumbai. • Visit the famous Gateway of India. • Visit the Hanging Gardens • Visit the Chowpatty – the famous beach of Mumbai. • Drive past the Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Terminus – Biggest train station of Mumbai. • Visit the Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj Museum. • Get a glimpse of Open Air Laundry – The Dhobi Ghat.

After breakfast, check out from the hotel and get transferred to Mumbai Airport and fly to Aurangabad. On arrival receive a warm welcome by our representative and get transferred to the hotel. On arrival complete the check-in formalities and rest for a while. Later, visit • The Ajanta Caves – one of the ancient Buddhist caves located in Maharashtra.

After breakfast, visit the • Ellora Caves – a pure architectural marvel. • Bibi Ka Maqbara – The Taj Mahal of Deccan. OPTIONAL TOURS • Visit the Daulatabad Fort • Visit the Himroo Factory – A 150-year-old Textile Factory.

After breakfast, check out from the hotel and travel to Nasik (195Km, 4-hour drive) – The Wine Capital of India. On arrival receive a warm welcome by our representative. Complete the check-in formalities and rest for a while. Later visit the Sita Gufa, Godavari Ghat (River Godavari Banks), and other temples to experience the local culture.
After breakfast, go for a Wine Tasting tour • Visit SULA Vineyards • Visit YORK Winery • Visit SOMA Vineyards
After breakfast, check out from the hotel and travel to Pune (211Km, 5-hour drive). On arrival receive a warm welcome and complete the check-in formalities and enjoy the rest of the day at leisure.

After breakfast, go for a sightseeing tour of the city with your guide • Visit the OSHO Ashram • Visit the Shaniwar Wada • Visit National War Memorial • Visit the Sinhagad and Khadakwasla Forts. • Visit Saras Garden • Visit Pataleshwar Cave Temple • Visit Mahatma Phule Museum.

After breakfast, check out from the hotel and get transferred to Pune Airport and fly to Ahmedabad. On arrival receive a warm welcome and get transferred to the hotel. Complete the check-in procedure and enjoy the rest of the day at leisure.

After breakfast, go for a sightseeing tour of the city with your guide • Visit Sabarmati Ashram – Place where Mahatma Gandhi stayed. • Visit the Kankaria Lake • Visit Adalaj Stepwell • Visit Bhadra Fort • Visit the Calico Museum of Textile • Enjoy the view from Sabarmati River Front. • Visit Jama Masjid

After breakfast, check out from the hotel and travel to Dasada (95Km, 3-hour drive). En-route see Sun Temple at Modhera. On arrival receive a warm welcome and complete the check-in formalities and enjoy the rest of the day at leisure.
After breakfast, go on a Jeep Safari in Little Rann of Kutch and spot various species of birds and animals. You have got good opportunity to spot Wild Asses that this sanctuary is famous for.
After breakfast, check out from the hotel and travel to Bhuj (276Km, 6-hour drive). On arrival receive a warm welcome and complete the check-in formalities and enjoy the rest of the day at leisure.

After breakfast, go for a sightseeing tour of the city with your guide • Visit Aaina Mahal Palace • Visit the Prag Mahal Palace • Visit Kutch Museum • Visit the Bhujio Hill • Visit Shree Swaminarayan Temple • Visit Harmirsar Lake
After breakfast check out from the hotel and travel to Bhuj Airport to fly back to Mumbai to end the trip.
